In England, in the seven days to 03 August, there were 160,560 new confirmed cases (283.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 July, there were 171,990 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 7% (11,430 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 August is 5,302,555 (9,376.7 cases per 100,000 population).
